title: Tend
description: Transfer money safely and securely when it matters most.

hero.headline: Spend less to send more. Instantly.
hero.sub-copy: The wait is over. $0 cross-border transfer fee from one Tend account to another - so more of your money goes instantly where it belongs - to your loved ones in Mexico.

send-money-abroad.headline: Send dollars. Reciben pesos.
send-money-abroad.body: Everyone should have access to a better money experience. Tha's why Tend, an easier way to save, spend, send and grow your green is now also a faster, safer and cheaper way to send money to Mexico.

mexico-transfers.headline: Easy (cross-border) moves..
mexico-transfers.body:
1. Download the Tend App and apply in minutes from your phone.
2. Add funds to your account.
3. Tap on Invite in the app to send an invitation to your money recipient in Mexico.
4. Once your recipient has the app and is approved, tap on Move$ in your app to make an instant transfer.
  Tap through Send Money> Choose a User> Enter the Amount> Insert the Verification Code> Accept.

Poof! The money will appear in their account like magic.
